title: Governance Foundations
description: Test your understanding of constitutional AI governance principles

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of Elohim agents in governance?
options: To make all decisions for humans
To serve as constitutional guardians while respecting human agency
questions.explanation: Elohim serve as guardians of constitutional principles while preserving human agency and dignity.

questions.question: In the Elohim hierarchy, which level handles family-specific matters?
questions.explanation: Family Elohim handle matters at the household level, protecting family privacy and values.

questions.question: Every governance decision in the protocol can be challenged.
questions.explanation: The right to challenge is constitutional - no decision is exempt from review.

questions.question: What happens if a governance SLA is breached?
options: The decision defaults in favor of the challenger
questions.explanation: SLA breaches have constitutional consequences to ensure responsive governance.

questions.question: What is the purpose of precedent in the governance system?
options: To make governance predictable and consistent over time
To reduce the number of appeals
questions.explanation: Precedent creates constitutional evolution through consistent, predictable decisions.
